Key Match Events: Dalton Knecht scored 10 points, dished one assist, and committed one turnover in 20:10 minutes of action.
Knecht shot 4 of 7, including 2 of 5 from deep.
Knecht entered the game in the second quarter and knocked down his first shot from downtown off a LeBron assist.
Knecht added four more points with a floater and a dunk, assisted by Anthony Davis.
Knecht connected on a 3-pointer in the second half to extend his tally to 10 points for the night.
Post-Match Reflections: Knecht's stock within the Lakers staff is steadily rising because of his gravity on offense and serviceable defense.
Knecht's size and shooting have created advantages for the Lakers against opposing second units.
Knecht is viewed as a polished prospect compared to his draft mates after spending four years in college.
JJ Redick is likely to make Dalton Knecht a regular rotation player due to his timely and crucial shot-making.
